content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the chart, compare minority representation in 1960 and 2010. (b) Explain how each of the following assisted in the removal of barriers to minority voting. Voting Rights Act of 1965 Twenty-fourth Amendment (c) Identify one barrier that currently impedes minority representation in Congress. Explain why the barrier you identified inhibits minority representation in Congress.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
